task_title: Watch my YouTube video and leave a comment
task_detail: Watch the full video about our new product launch and leave a genuine comment with your thoughts.
submission_info: Submit a screenshot showing your comment under the video.

task_detail: Follow our official Instagram account and like the last 3 posts.
submission_info: Submit your Instagram username for verification.

task_title: Write a short review on our Facebook page
task_detail: Write an honest review on our Facebook page about your experience with our service.
submission_info: Submit a link to your review post.
